system.description: Tiki is a CMS system based on a Wiki, it has all the features a regular Wiki application and a whole lot more. Tiki uses PHP and templates via Smarty for a customizable layout and look & feel. Features: Wiki pages, File Galleries, Comments, Image Galleries, Forums, Multi-language support, Permission system using groups and users , Weblogs, CMS system (Articles, submissions and topics), Banners, Dynamic Content, Polls, Chat, RSS feeds, Communications center using an XMLRPC API.
